## New Type: ArrayPatternPath
Represents structural patterns of nested arrays used for DiffResult grouping and ID key association.

### Format & Examples
- Format: 'boomerForecastV3Requests[].parameters.accountParams[].contributions[].contributions[]'
- Uses [] to denote array positions (no specific indices or IDs)
- Final [] indicates the target array where ID-based comparison occurs
- All paths matching the same pattern share the same ID key for comparison
